meanings.definition: The act of shooting a gun in a quick and skillful manner.
meanings.sent1: During the gunslingings at the competition, the fastest shooter won.
meanings.sent2: His gunslingings were admired by all who witnessed his quick draw.
meanings.sent3: In the wild west show, the gunslingings of the performers amazed the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her gunslingings on the target were as precise as a surgeon's scalpel.
meanings.sent5: The gunslingings in the action movie were so intense, it felt like you were there.

meanings.definition: The practice or skill of using a gun in a quick and skillful manner.
meanings.sent1: The gunslingings of the old sheriff were legendary in the town.
meanings.sent2: Learning gunslingings takes dedication and practice.
meanings.sent3: The gunslingings class at the shooting range was always full of eager students.
meanings.sent4: His gunslingings were so precise, it was like watching an artist at work.
meanings.sent5: The gunslingings of the sharpshooter were unmatched in the entire county.
